TopicTitle: Dusting off the ghosts of the past.

Articles.Content:
Today i bring to you some of the oldest archives of my KSP experience.

Some of these were made ingame and some others didn't make it due to the lack of time

Archive 1

The first Rocketeer Titan

This image shows one of my best workhorses i've built The far left one is the Original model V1 (Got defunct when KW engines were rebalanced, This made the model unable to reach orbit but it was able to do it!).

Center one is the Mun Achiever model or "AP" (Which delivered a "KFC Delivery" to the Kraken as peace sign, Apollo Style.)

Right one is the Titan 2M (Actually the standard but merget to the Mighty Titan S3 equipped whit Kerbodyne Second Lineal stage or MACKERS M30 Stage)

Archive 2

Eseneo 4

This is the only image left of the Eseneo design concept. Eseneo was a family of probes i made back on my first serious gameplay, The Eseneo 1-2 were used as Khetane Scanners And 3rd one was a extractor but was lost during Mun landing (I barely got into mun whit an even older launcher than Titan). Whit a need of taking a bigger step forward i decided to start a new station (At this moment i already had the Pavel Space Station in orbit) But whit a extended capacity.

The Eseneo 4 Begins!:

It was a hard task (Mainly during ring launch as first module), But after hard work i managed to attach the Solar module and a living quarter. Saddly it was never completed due to game updates.

Archive 3

Azkardan Orbital Outpost

Im happy to announce that this one was succesfully completed, So sad it never was really used as planned.

This station was intended to erradicate a smaller outpost already orbiting Mun, The Azkardan Module would push it down then recover its own orbital speed.

The hardest part of its assembling was the Solar arrays (Specially the large one). Every of the modules were assembled as shown on the photo.

Archive 4

"The Black Knight"

This was supposed to be my first Heavy transport vehicle, The Black Knight was developed from the obsolete and ineffective XOR Corsairs pusher systems to pull cargo to Mun and Minmus, Its concept was barely documented as effective and only 2 of its 5 modules were put in orbit and docked. Saddly i decided it was just as obsolete as its predecessors. It eventually got replaced whit the DOS-8 Self Propulsed orbital outpost.

As bonus i leave here the only pic of it in orbit.

If you liked to see some of my old concepts i have much more than these awaiting for reveal, Just make me know if you want them, Or additional information of any of the already posted ones (Because i have footage from some mentioned vehicles or stations).

Thanks!

I remember before I bought KSP I had the wildest ideas I wanted to build. I wanted an orbital strike launcher on a space station with artificial gravity! Then I actually played KSP and realized how useless all that would be and how difficult that would be to build. :|

Ahhh...the pre-KSP days.
